verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> have hardened <S%H3513><s%> <S%H853><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> I might show <S%H7896><s%> these <S%H428><s%> my signs <S%H226><s%> before <S%H7130><s%> him:

And that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest tell <S%H5608><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of thy son, <S%H1121><s%> and of thy son's <S%H1121><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H853><s%> what things <S%H834><s%> I have wrought <S%H5953><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and my signs <S%H226><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H7760><s%> among them; that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> how that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt thou refuse <S%H3985><s%> to humble thyself <S%H6031><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> me? let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.

Else, <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> the locusts <S%H697><s%> into thy coast: <S%H1366><s%>

And they shall cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the face <S%H5869><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that one cannot <S%H3808><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> of that which is escaped, <S%H6413><s%> which remaineth <S%H7604><s%> unto you from <S%H4480><s%> the hail, <S%H1259><s%> and shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> which groweth <S%H6779><s%> for you out of <S%H4480><s%> the field: <S%H7704><s%>

And they shall fill <S%H4390><s%> thy houses, <S%H1004><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> nor thy fathers' <S%H1><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> have seen, <S%H7200><s%> since the day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that they were <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H127><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> And he turned <S%H6437><s%> himself, and went out <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall this man <S%H2088><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto us? let <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God: <S%H430><s%> knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not yet <S%H2962><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is destroyed? <S%H6><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> were brought again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Go, <S%H1980><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> but who <S%H4310><s%> <S%H4310><s%> are they that shall go? <S%H1980><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> We will go <S%H1980><s%> with our young <S%H5288><s%> and with our old, <S%H2205><s%> with our sons <S%H1121><s%> and with our daughters, <S%H1323><s%> with our flocks <S%H6629><s%> and with our herds <S%H1241><s%> will we go; <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> we must hold a feast <S%H2282><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Let the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you, as <S%H834><s%> I will let you go, <S%H7971><s%> and your little ones: <S%H2945><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> to it; for <S%H3588><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> is before <S%H5048><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

Not <S%H3808><s%> so: <S%H3651><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> ye that are men, <S%H1397><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> that ye <S%H859><s%> did desire. <S%H1245><s%> And they were driven out <S%H1644><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> presence. <S%H6440><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for the locusts, <S%H697><s%> that they may come up <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> even <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the hail <S%H1259><s%> hath left. <S%H7604><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5090><s%> an east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that night; <S%H3915><s%> and when it was <S%H1961><s%> morning, <S%H1242><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> brought <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the locusts. <S%H697><s%>

And the locusts <S%H697><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and rested <S%H5117><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> were they; before <S%H6440><s%> them there were <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> such <S%H3651><s%> locusts <S%H697><s%> as they, neither <S%H3808><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them shall be <S%H1961><s%> such. <S%H3651><s%>

For they covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the face <S%H5869><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> was darkened; <S%H2821><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the hail <S%H1259><s%> had left: <S%H3498><s%> and there remained <S%H3498><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> green thing <S%H3418><s%> in the trees, <S%H6086><s%> or in the herbs <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in haste; <S%H4116><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and against you.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore forgive, <S%H5375><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> only <S%H389><s%> this once, <S%H6471><s%> and entreat <S%H6279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that he may take away <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me this <S%H2088><s%> <S%H853><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> only. <S%H7535><s%>
And he went out <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and entreated <S%H6279><s%> <S%H413><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> a mighty <S%H3966><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> west <S%H3220><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> which took away <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the locusts, <S%H697><s%> and cast <S%H8628><s%> them into the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea; <S%H3220><s%> there remained <S%H7604><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> locust <S%H697><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H853><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> so that he would not <S%H3808><s%> let <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that there may be <S%H1961><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even darkness <S%H2822><s%> which may be felt. <S%H4959><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> a thick <S%H653><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

They saw <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from his place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> for three <S%H7969><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> but all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> light <S%H216><s%> in their dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H1980><s%> ye, serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> let your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%> be stayed: <S%H3322><s%> let your little ones <S%H2945><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> must give <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H3027><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> and burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

Our cattle <S%H4735><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us; there shall not <S%H3808><s%> a hoof <S%H6541><s%> be left behind; <S%H7604><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thereof <S%H4480><s%> must we take <S%H3947><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> and we <S%H587><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> with what <S%H4100><s%> we must serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we come <S%H935><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>
But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H853><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> let them go. <S%H7971><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Get <S%H1980><s%> thee from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself, see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> no <S%H408><s%> more; <S%H3254><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> thou seest <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> thou shalt die. <S%H4191><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> well, <S%H3651><s%> I will see <S%H7200><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>
